reviewText:
This is a waste of a DVD disk.  It is a recording of a recording that is in the public domain.  I cannot believe I fell for this.
Don't let it happen to you.

Okay...so it is a slide show accompanying a reading of the archaic translation by Ian Johnston (rather convoluted syntax to say the least), but the worst part is that it is incomplete: entirely missing Chapter 1! I declare this a rip-off and suggest nobody even consider buying this or the audio download of the same!

I thought I was buying a movie but it turned out to be an unorthodox audiobook translation with a few still frames of beetles. I returned it for a refund as I know more about the German than the translator. My rating is based on disappointed expectations more than anything else.
